name: Realm Rush
description:
How to play:

Place towers on the map to shoot at enemies. Towers cannot be placed on the enemies path. You start with two towers but can buy a third one with coins you get from killing enemies

While at you limit for towers clicking on the map where a tower can be placed will instead move a tower to that location.

You can buy upgrades that improve the damage of your towers, a repair that fixes your base, and a new tower from the side bar in the user interface. Just click on the button that corresponds to what you want to buy. The cost will be displayed beneath the button. Buying things increases the cost of all items.
